entry.title: U.S. Seeks Help From Arab States to Plan Gaza Governance After War
entry.content: While some see a role for Qatar, Washington and its partners are struggling to enlist volunteers.

entry.title: From Taxi Driver to Trump Case: Colorful New York Judge Is in the Spotlight
entry.content: Arthur Engoron, who played in a rock band and is promoting a screenplay, is deciding a civil-fraud case against the former president.

entry.title: Israeli Forces Encircle Gaza City as Americans Prepare to Leave Strip
entry.content: The U.N. says Israel’s military operation has largely severed the city from the rest of the enclave, trapping hundreds of thousands.

entry.title: China Mourns Former Premier Whose Death Hovers Over Xi Jinping
entry.content: Passing of Li Keqiang has sparked an outpouring of grief that some have used as an avenue to criticize Xi’s hard-line rule.
